categories.description: Choose the offer categories that you want to approve. This means that the life tokens obtained for donations at your facilities will be redeemable for offers in the approved categories.

editProfile.dragOrtap: Drag or tap to the demand level that represent your Lifebank actual necesities. You can set the token rewards depending on this levels.
editProfile.noValidUrl: The link must not have special characters
editProfile.noUniqueUrl: This link is associated with another account
editProfile.information: The information on this page can be viewed on your info page. Please, include detailed and accurate information so donors can easily find you.
editProfile.addressDescription: Describe your address and use the map to select the right location so the donors can get to you easily.
editProfile.imageryDescription: Include images that are appealing to donors! Paste a link to an image you want to include in your profile. You can upload images using imgur.com for free. Your logo or avatar must be square-shaped and no larger than 500 px or bigger than 250 KB. The banner image should be horizontal, no larger than 1200 px wide or bigger than 1 MB

donations.findAsponsor: Find a Sponsor and Redeem your LifebankTokens!
donations.toReceiveTokens: To receive tokens from a Lifebank you need to provide your user name or show the following QR.
donations.toReceiveTokensDonor: To receive tokens from a donor you need to provide your user name or show the following QR.
donations.toSendTo: To send tokens to a sponsor you need to enter their username or detect a QR with your camera.
donations.toSendToDonor: To send tokens to a donor you need to enter their username or detect a QR with your camera.
donations.memoDonor: Thank you for redeeming your token

splash.workTogether: Let's work together and keep the life flowing
splash.isAplace: is a place where you can donate blood
splash.sponsorDescription: are businesses that will reward people that have donated through a Lifebank
splash.donorsDescription: will donate blood and be rewarded with life tokens which they can redeem at their convenience with sponsors of their community.

about.eosioBased: Lifebank is an EOSIO-based dapp that helps local communities create a virtuous circle of value exchange between three parties â€” eligible life donors, community donation centers, and participating local businesses (sponsors).
about.eoscrInitiative: Lifebank is an initiative of EOS Costa Rica, a company that develops blockchain-based solutions to solve real-world problems. Lifebank is our entry to the Coding for Change challenge organized by leading blockchain company, Block.one.
about.lifebankIsApowerful: Lifebank is a powerful application that uses blockchain technology to save lives. After completing a donation at any registered Lifebank, a life donor will earn a Life Token that can be redeemed at a local sponsor.
about.weIdentified: We identified two main problems: a blood donation shortage and a local economic slowdown. Amid the COVID-19 outbreak, blood banks urgently need donors. People who are potential qualifying donors are prompted to stay home and isolate. As donations plummet and demand for blood and plasma increases, blood banks are experiencing a pronounced global shortage.
about.moreOver: Moreover, the pandemic is impacting local economies due to a generalized lockdown. Small businesses that rely on the local community must think of ways to incentivize customers to buy as soon as restrictions are lifted.
about.aDonorCanEarn: A donor can earn life tokens after completing a blood donation at a Lifebank participating donation center. Donation centers can issue a maximum of 10,000 life tokens. These tokens can then be redeemed by the donor at any local business (or sponsor) in exchange for discounts or promotions.
about.also: Also, sponsors can save these tokens and then return them to donation centers to keep the tokens active.
about.weDontRequest: We don't request or store any personal information on the blockchain. You may optionally add a full name.

offerApproval.description: Here you can approve or reject the categories of redeemable offers.
offerApproval.description2: If you think that a category doesn't represent your organization, feel free to uncheck it, and automatically the life tokens obtained at your center will not be redeemable in exchange for any of these offers.
offerApproval.message1: These offers are available because you approved this category. Change it anytime.
offerApproval.message2: These offers aren't available because you unchecked this category. Change it anytime.
